name: Patient - Family History
content: Father with Coronary Artery Disease, Mother with Osteoporosis

name: Doctor Note - Yearly Checkup
content:
# Primary Care Visit

## Reason for Visit

Yearly Checkup

## Medical history

### Heredity

No history of significant hereditary diseases.

### Social

Married. Has two children. Retired IT technician.

### Diseases

Previously underwent scrotal surgery. Has had a vasectomy.

### Current Situation

The patient feels generally well. Regularly monitors blood pressure.

### Medications

Please see the updated list in the Medical Record.

### Hypersensitivity/Allergy

No known drug hypersensitivity

## Examination

### General Condition

Good and unaffected

### Heart

Regular rhythm, normofrequent.

### Lungs

Vesicular breath sounds, no additional sounds.

### Blood Pressure

142/90

## Recommendations

Given the increase in blood pressure, prescribed Enalapril/Hydrochlorothiazide. Recommend a low-sodium diet and regular aerobic exercise. Schedule a follow-up appointment in 6 months to monitor blood pressure and medication efficacy.
